Key: (All right. I'll take Yoshino out to have fun!)
I'm home!

(Huh... No greeting from Yoshino? Is it possible
she's not here...?)

(I thought maybe I'd take her to the amusement
park for once, but...)
Shido-san... Welcome... home...
Oh, so you were here.
Yoo-hoo, Shido-kun!
(Yoshinon is energetic as usual...)
H-Hey... I'm home, Yoshinon.

I wanted to ask... Do you know what an amusement
park is, Yoshino?

Shido-san... Welcome... home...
U-Umm...
Yoo-hoo, Shido-kun! Don't you have something you\nwant to say～?
Something I want to say...?

O-Oh, right...
Yeah, I do have something to say.

Thank you, Yoshino and Yoshinon.
The bunny in the bento made me happy.
Y-Yes!
Good for you, huh, Yoshino!

...Since you made such a cute bento for me,
I have to thank you somehow.
N-No... You don't have to...

You don't have to hold back.
I want to thank you both.
B-But...
Now now, no need to be so modest, Yoshino.\nOh, Shido-kun. Yoshino's just being shy!\nOf course we're happy for a thank you!

Hmm... As thanks... Let me see...
Yoshino, do you know what an amusement park is?
Th-The amusement park?!
Oh, so you do know it.

I-I saw it... on TV, before.
I-It said it's... a very fun place...

That's right. That amusement park.
Do you want to go today, together?
Huh?!

It's to thank you for today's bunny...
If you really don't want to accept,
then I won't push it...

Well, I know you're not good with crowds, Yoshino.
But I thought it might be good to change things up
once in a while and go have some fun.

It's important to get used to people, too...
Of course, if you really don't want to,
then I won't push it...
Ahh... Ohh... Wh-What should I do, Yoshinon...?
There's no point in asking me～ You're the one\nwho's getting invited, so you have to decide for\nyourself～

That's not true. It's just as much an
invite to thank you too, Yoshinon.
Really?! How charming of you, Shido-kun.\nEven Yoshinon might end up falling for you～
Hahaha... So, what do you want to do?
U-Umm...
Yoshino, let's be honest with ourselves.\nShido-kun's being honest too, you know?
I-I'll, go! Please... t-take me there.

All right. Then, it's decided.
Go ahead and get ready. Let's get going!
Y-Yes!
A-Aahh...
There are a lot of people here...
Y-Yes, there are...
Wh-What... should I do, Yoshinon...?
...I don't think there's really anything Yoshinon\ncan do～

Wh-Wha...?
Don't say that... Yoshinon...
Rather than rely on me, there's someone else here\nyou should rely on first, isn't there～?
Huh...?
Yoshino.
...Huh?
It's all right. Give me your hand.
Oh...
Here... If we hold hands, then you can't get lost.
Ah... Y-Yes.

Shido-san, your hand... is warm... it makes
me feel better.

...I see, that's good.
Then, let's get going.
Keep a tight grip!
Yes...!
You too, Yoshinon! Right?
Of course!

Well, a date at the amusement park... There are
lots of different rides, but which one to get
on...?
Hello there, Shido-kun. It seems you were\nsuccessful in taking Yoshino out on a date.\nFrom here on is the true battle!
Kannazuki-san?!
Shido-kun, have you decided which attraction\nyou'll be guiding Yoshino through?

No, I haven't really decided or anything yet...
Could it be... a choice selection?
No, unfortunately the Fraxinus' functions haven't\nfully returned, so we are not able to formulate\npotential choices with our distinguished AI.
...That's good.
But rest assured! An expert in the field will\noffer you advice... And that would be me!
What?! Is that... really all right?
What are you saying? Leave everything to me!
R-Right...
I'm worried...
This time around, it's an amusement park date...\nThere are two potential approaches.
I see... What are the two approaches?
The first is haunted house tour! Is this pounding\nof the heart from fear or from love? Either way,\nthis is sure to draw you two closer together!

Is that the Suspension Bridge effect?
I've heard of that.
At the right moment, if you let out a scream and\nhold onto Yoshino, she's sure to unleash a rolling\nsobat, and you'll be able to ascend!

I'm the one who's holding onto her?! More
importantly, this is Yoshino, remember? She's not
Kotori. She wouldn't counterattack like that...
Oh... Of course I knew that. Don't you worry.

You just said, "Oh," didn't you?! Can't you take
this seriously?!
The other approach is to set the stage for a\npeaceful time together. Ride the ferris wheel and\ntalk of love while gazing at the distant sky...

Don't ignore me!
But, well, I see... Putting aside the love part,
that does sound fun on its own.
If circumstances allow, you may find yourself\nembracing Yoshino, only to have her kick you out\nof the window and watch you dive from its peak!
Didn't I say that's more Kotori?!
Either way, there's no mistake that you should\nsteal Yoshino's heart! The choice is yours,\nShido-kun!
(Why is my heart... full of uncertainty...?)
Go to the haunted house!
Go on the Ferris Wheel!

Yoshino...
Would you like to go to the haunted house for now?
Haunted... house...? Isn't that... scary...?

Well, I suppose it is scary... But it's the fun
kind of scary. I'll be with you the whole time,
but... do you not want to go?

I-I'll... go...
If I'm... with you, Shido-san... I'll be fine!
All right, let's go!
...Eeek!!
Yoshino, it's all right...
Yes...
Ahh, getting handsy in here, Shido-kun?!\nJust because it's dark!
Wha... Er, no. Sorry, I... Yoshino, your hand...
Good grief! I can see your lewd intentions from\nhere! How concerning... Here, go to the other\nside!
R-Right... Sorry... Thanks, Yoshinon.
*Whistle*～! You two are such a cute match!

(Yoshino's hand grabbed mine so tightly, I could
almost feel her heart beat in her hand...)

Either way, it looks like the haunted
house was a success.
For now, let's get on the ferris wheel...
Ferris... wheel...?

Yeah, look... It's that big wheel over there.
If you go up to the top, you can see a really
nice view.

Yes... If it's... where you're going, Shido-san...
Anywhere is fine...
(...All right! That feels good!)
Okay, then let's go.

See? How is it, Yoshino? The ground is getting
farther away.
...Y-Yes, it is.

Look, you can see Neo Tengu Tower
over there, too...
...Yes.
H-How is it? Isn't it fun?
Y-Yes...

(Hmm, it's kinda awkward when she won't respond
back... I have to liven things up somehow...)
Whoa!
Sh-Shido-san...! Are you okay...?

Y-Yeah... I'm totally fine.
H-How was it, Yoshino? Was it fun?
The sky... was pretty...
(That's sort of a roundabout response...)

If I'm... with you, Shido-san...
I'm always... having fun...
O-Oh, really?!
Yes, it... doesn't have to be... a high place...
I-I see. Hahaha... I'm glad to hear that...

All right, then, let's try getting
on something else.
Y-Yes...!
A...Aahh...

Whoa! A-Are you okay, Yoshino?
Are you scared of the rollercoaster?
I-I'm... fine...

Whew, the rollercoaster was a bit much.
Even I got a little scared.

All right... Next, let's go to Labyrinth Busters.
We can have a laser-tag battle!

Hey, you're pretty good!
Your aim is true. I can't lose, either...
Go! Do your best, Yoshino!\nShido-kun ran off that way! Take him down!

...Whew. I completely lost.
You're surprisingly good at this, Yoshino.

Th-That's... not true.
Yoshinon... did her best too, so...
Right, I see. Yoshino, are you having fun?

Yes... I'm very happy...
that I came to... the amusement park with you...!

All right, then I'll stay here with you for the
rest of the day!
...Yes!
Ah... Ohhh... Wh-Whoa...
Here, Yoshino! Step on the brakes here!
Y-Yes... Go!
Oh, looking good! You're great at this!

Hey, you're catching on!
All right. Here goes!
Yah...! Yah...!
I won't let you! Come on, I'm gonna pass you!

Shido-san, there were... a lot of firsts for me...
and it was a lot of fun!

Yeah, I had tons of fun, too.
Right, Yoshinon? You think so too, right?
...Yoshinon?
Huh? Did he not hear?
Yeah, you're right... It was fun, Yoshino...
Yeah...

All right, let's get back into
it for the last lap!
I was able to... ride a lot of rides!

Yeah, you look like you're satisfied. If you're
happy, Yoshino, then it was worth coming here.
Yes...

You were a little quiet today, Yoshinon. I thought
you'd comment more on Yoshino's driving...
It's kinda unusual, what's up?
...Well, you know～
Hmm...?
...Yoshino's... fine now, isn't she...?
...Yoshinon?

...It looks like you're really trusted.
Good thing, huh, Yoshino?
Oops, it's already late. We'd better head home.

Before that... Yoshino, could you wait here for
just a moment?
Huh? Wh-Where... are you going?
Er, just over there...
I-I'll... come with you...!
Ah... Er... Sorry, Yoshino...
Why not...?

Well... I can't take you to the
men's restroom, right?
Huh? Oh...!
Th-The bathroom.... S-Sorry...
Yeah, so I'll be right back...
Y-Yes...
Whew... All right, Yoshino is... Oh, there she is.
Hm?
U-Umm...
...So that's how it is～

(Yoshino and Yoshinon are talking? I wonder why it
feels like it's a complicated conversation...)

(I kinda feel like I shouldn't interrupt... But
still, I wonder what they're talking about...?)
Hey, Yoshino. You're still a kid, aren't you～?
Y-Yeah...
Yoshino, do you still want to stay a kid?\nOr do you want to become an adult～?
I... think I... want to be an adult...
...I see～
Yoshinon...?
You want to be an adult\nbecause of this, right...?

...?!
T-That's, um... Well...
Yoshino, do you know how a kid is able to become\nan adult～?
I-I don't know...
Yoshinon thinks it's probably like this～
When you're relying on your parents,\nyou're still a kid...
Parents...?
Yup, that's right～\nI think you might have started to realize too,\nYoshino. That it's... almost time...
(Sh-Shoot...)
(...Yoshinon noticed me!)
...Oh, Shido-kun. You're already back～?\nYou should have told us if you were back～
Ah, er... Sorry, did I get in the way?
No, it's fine, it's fine～ We were just gossiping\nabout you, Shido-kun.
...I-I see.
Man, today was lots of fun～\nLet's go home now!

Y-Yeah, you're right.
All right, Yoshino... Let's go home.
...Yes.
Boy, today was a really fun day!\nYoshinon probably won't ever forget about today!\nYoshino looked so happy...

I wonder what Yoshinon's happiness is.\n	
Message	Yoshinon	"I wonder if Yoshino's happiness is really\nYoshinon's happiness, too...
